summary: Ortmer are a new race on the face of tamriel
descriptionHtml:
Requirements:
update.esm

I made this race for personal use but decided to share it in case someone else is interested in this.

Skill bonuses:
Heavy armor 5
Smithing 5
One-handed 5
Restoration 5
Destruction 5
Enchanting 5
Conjuration 5

Ability:
Berserk

The ortmer are a very young race of rough-looking mer. They are essentially High-Elf/Orc hybrids and as such are tall, strong and gifted in smithing, wearing heavy armor and magic abilities.

It is my first racial mod, so it's not perfect I know :)

If there are any bugs i would like to know
author: Skylol
